category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_upload_client_path
preference.preference_description: Specifies the absolute path for the International Material Data System (IMDS) upload batch client. This value is used to send data to the IMDS upload batch client.
